Text: Taku Setan kwane̩ akobo̩ abo Israe̩l, oñ i ki Defid e̩che̩ ki fʼabo Israe̩l kaluka.
Oñ Defid ka ñwu Joab kpʼamagboji amone̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ lo ku me̩ fʼabo Israe̩l kaluka akwo Birshiba gbogbo wa Dan; ku me̩ kʼohi wa ñwu mi, kʼu fʼaluka-ma ma.

Taku Jo̩ab kakini, Jihofa ki je̩ ñw abo-wñ ku ma wewe tʼalu ku ma de̩ abajo̩i le onu ogume̩lu ta; O odu-mi onu, o̩chaka-ma chʼamadu odu-mi-i n? e̩wñ chi kʼodu-mi atene e̩wñ-i? e̩wñ chi kʼi adʼo̩la-wñ chʼe̩wñ ki aje̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dʼO̩jo̩ re ta?
I chaka kʼabe̩le̩, o̩la onu fʼe-Joab du. Todule̩ Joab kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼugbo du ane̩ Israe̩l, oñ i lewa Je̩rusale̩m.

Taku Joab mʼonu ki chʼaluka amone̩ kʼi kaluka le̩ du ñwu Defid. Oñ o̩chaka aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l ku ma bʼo̩kwo̩chageli ewo jo̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogume̩lu; e-Juda la chʼaboke̩le̩ one̩ Icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ulo̩ko̩ nyʼe̩te̩gwa ku ma bʼo̩kwo̩chageli ewo jo̩.
I muda kaluka abo Lifai kpʼabo Be̩njamin tʼefu ma n; todu o̩la kʼonu ka le̩ chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñwu Joab.
Oñ e̩wñ le̩ bie̩ne̩ eju O̩jo̩; todule̩ i fʼabo Israe̩l gwoda.
Taku Defid ka ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, U fʼadure ta tabale, e̩wñ kʼomi che-i, fai o̩ko̩ nagba bʼe̩, kʼe̩ la dʼudu kʼadu-we̩-i fe̩ tinyo̩; todu u fʼe̩wñ idada che nana.
Taku Jihofa ko̩la ñwu Gad, ki chʼagane̩ Defid, kakini,
Lo, kʼe̩ ka ñwu Defid kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, E̩wñ me̩ta oñ nano̩wo̩ dala ñw e̩-i; mʼo̩ka-wñ du kʼu chʼe̩.
Abe̩le̩ Gad lewʼugbo Defid oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, E-ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ e̩ du ke:

abe̩k ukpo̩ta ki kpa o̩do̩ me̩ta; abe̩k elenyo̩ rʼo̩gba ame̩no̩la-we̩ kʼo̩kwo̩chageli ame̩nebi-we̩ ki mʼe̩ ochu me̩ta; abe̩k o̩kwo̩chageli Jihofa, owñ chʼe̩wñ ibi ki che ane̩-i kʼonuche̩ Jihofa ki nado̩mo̩ akpʼe̩wñ bie̩ ugbo du ef alo̩me̩ Israe̩l gbogbo o̩jo̩ me̩ta. Todule̩ fai e̩ fulo kʼu ma ohi kʼu nadu dabiwa ñw e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi uche̩-i.
Taku Defid ka ñwu Gad kakini, U kwo̩tʼo̩ me̩: o̩ko̩ nagbabʼe̩, e̩ je̩ ñwu mi ñwa tef o̩wo̩ Jihofa; todu ejumomi-wñ tabale: e̩ ki muda je̩ ñwu mi ñwa tef o̩wo̩ one̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ Jihofa fʼe̩wñ ibi kpe̩ ru abo Israe̩l o̩la; oñ aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l ki wane̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ e̩te̩gwa.

O̩jo̩ la fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ nyi Je̩rusale̩m kʼi fʼu kpabie̩; oñ abu kʼi do̩mo̩ akpʼo̩ bie̩ Jihofa go, oñ e̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ wʼo̩ tak i ka ñw onuche̩ ki do̩mo̩ akpʼe̩wñ bie̩ le̩ kakini, I bo̩jo̩ me̩, bʼo̩wo̩-we̩ lo̩ ta. Onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ la dago ugbo ajita ugwo̩ka O̩rnan e̩ne̩ Je̩bius le̩.

Taku Defid mʼeju-wñ ko rʼate̩, oñ i li abu kʼonuche̩ Jihofa dago agbagba ane̩ ile̩ kpʼefojale, kʼo̩kwo̩chageli chʼe̩wo̩ nʼo̩wo̩-wñ kʼi nadala te̩ abʼoji Je̩rusale̩m ma. Taku Defid kpʼabogijo kʼe̩gbanukpo dʼo̩la-ma le̩, lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma.

Oñ Defid ka ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, I chʼomi ñwa ñwu ma ku ma kʼamone̩ Israe̩l aluka n? Omi chʼe̩ne̩ ki dure, kʼu la fʼe̩wñ bibi inuina le̩ che. I la chʼe-ame̩wño̩re̩ egini-i, e̩wñ ma che? O Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñw o̩wo̩-we̩ ki kobʼumi kpʼabo unyi ala-mi; i ki muda ko̩bo̩ abo e-we̩ n, kʼe̩wñ ibi ki che ma n.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa ñwa ñw u Gad kʼi ka ñwu Defid, ku Defid ki mute̩gu alo kʼi fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne ñwu Jihofa oj ajita ugwo̩ka O̩rnan e̩ne̩ Je̩bius le̩.
Taku Defid mute̩gu alo, o̩la ku Gad ka ef odu Jihofa le̩.
Tak O̩rnan dejubi, oñ i fʼonuche̩ le̩ li, amo̩ma-wñ me̩le̩ ku majʼugbo-wñ la kʼo̩la-ma maja. O̩rnan la do̩mo̩ agwʼo̩ka wit.
Taku Defid lewa ugbo O̩rnan, O̩rnan go, oñ i fu Defid li, tak i kwo bʼajita ugwo̩ka le̩ te̩ nyʼo̩do̩da oñ i te̩kpe̩ ñwu Defid, eju-wñ la bʼane̩ ma.
Taku Defid ka ñw O̩rnan kakini, Mʼugbo ajita ugwo̩ka-i du ñwu mi kʼu nʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ñwu Jihofa oji-wñ; e̩ du mi la, e̩ ki bʼaja-wñ wane̩ n, kʼe̩wñ ibi-i ki bʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ ugbo amone̩-i.

Tak O̩rnan ka ñwu Defid kakini, E̩ mʼu du ke; odu-mi onu ki che e̩wñ ki nyo̩ eju-wñ; go nakʼamokuno̩ tod e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ñw e̩, kpʼane̩ ku ma ne̩ gwʼo̩ka ki chʼiji, kpʼo̩ka wit tod e̩wñ ele̩-wñ ge̩; o̩chaka-wñ nako̩ chʼe̩ ele.
Taku Defid, onu, ka ñw O̩rnan kakini, O̩da; omi muda ala alu kʼaja-wñ de̩ yiili; todu omi agbʼe̩wñ e-we̩ todu Jihofa n, u la akʼe̩wñ kʼomi ma chʼudu-wñ n che iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo n.
Taku Defid mʼo̩jamalia kʼuwoji-wñ che she̩ke̩l ulo̩gwa ko ñw O̩rnan tod ugbo kide̩.
Taku Defid fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne ñwu Jihofa o̩mo̩, oñ i kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ wa che, oñ i kwado̩ Jihofa; tak i nʼuna kwʼefojale wa oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ dohi ñw u.
Taku Jihofa ko̩la ñw onuche̩ le̩, oñ i mʼo̩kwo̩chageli-wñ du dabi tunyu ako̩-wñ.
Iko le̩, e̩gba ku Defid li ka ku Jihofa mʼohi du ñw u ugbo ajita ugwo̩ka O̩rnan, e̩ne̩ Je̩bius le̩, i la chʼiche̩bo̩ o̩mo̩.
Todu uña ugugu Jihofa e-ki Mose̩s che aje̩tachi le̩, kpʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-wñ, jʼo̩i otete ki gbo̩gba Gibeo̩n iko le̩.
Defid la neke nyʼo̩gba-wñ o̩mo̩ kʼi tʼO̩jo̩ ene n, todu i railo todu o̩kwo̩chageli onuche̩ Jihofa le̩.
